message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
Thank you for offering the product. I understand its value might be different to you, but based on my research and needs, I am willing to pay up to $120 for it.

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $180. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but based on my budget and the market value, I am only willing to pay $150 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
